alert.note: Alert for North Snowy Range Foothills; South Laramie Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 23 at 3:40AM MST until December 23 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, west winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 70 mph. For the High Wind Watch, west winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...North Snowy Range Foothills and South Laramie Range. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until 5 PM MST this afternoon. For the High Wind Watch, from 5pm MST this afternoon through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.

area.areaDesc: North Snowy Range Foothills; South Laramie Range
